name: Abyss Skull
description:
Abyss Skull is a Roguelite  in which you play as an undead that throws spears. Lots of spears. It's fairly simple and small at the moment.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys: movement
  • Z: Attack
  • X: Interact
  • Escape: Quit to main menu (or quit from game if already there)

I'm going to take a break from this game now that i have released the first version.
My plan is to then return to this and make it a bit better, though i might not succeed at that.

Edit: Yeah, not going well...
